text.div:
ResponseToNeoadjuvantTherapy

The response of the tumour to neoadjuvant treatment must be recorded.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    444431007 Grade 0 on a scale of 0 to 3 (qualifier value)
    444456001 Grade 1 on a scale of 0 to 3 (qualifier value)
    444457005 Grade 2 on a scale of 0 to 3 (qualifier value)
    444447009 Grade 3 on a scale of 0 to 3 (qualifier value)
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-response-to-neoadjuvant-therapy
